## PopulatableMosaic.unstakeUniTokens() method

Withdraw Uniswap REEF/MoUSD LP tokens from liquidity mining.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedMosaicTransaction<P, SentMosaicTransaction<S, MosaicReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to withdraw. |
